alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 23 at 4:16AM EST until January 23 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Localized minor flooding and splash-over is possible around the time of high tide late this morning and early this afternoon. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York and Coastal Cumberland Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 2 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 23/12 PM 11.1 2.3 1.0 3 None 24/01 AM 8.5 -0.3 -0.3 4 None 24/01 PM 9.6 0.8 -0.4 4 None 25/02 AM 9.3 0.5 0.3 3 None 25/02 PM 9.9 1.1 0.3 1 None 26/02 AM 10.3 1.5 1.3 3-4 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 23/12 PM 11.5 2.0 1.0 3 Minor 24/01 AM 8.9 -0.6 -0.3 4 None 24/01 PM 9.9 0.4 -0.4 3 None 25/02 AM 9.5 -0.0 0.3 2-3 None 25/02 PM 10.2 0.7 0.3 1-2 None 26/02 AM 10.5 1.0 1.3 3-4 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 23/12 PM 12.3 2.6 0.8 1-2 Minor 24/01 AM 9.4 -0.3 -0.7 2 None 24/01 PM 10.7 1.0 -0.6 1 None 25/01 AM 10.2 0.5 0.0 1 None 25/02 PM 11.0 1.3 0.1 1 None 26/02 AM 11.3 1.6 1.2 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
